Texts.Eng: Constructing a ^orange;Xeno Lab^reset; upon upgrading your ^orange;Machining Table^reset; is a good idea, as they are ^green;much faster^reset;! Effectively every plant seed can be placed within seed labs, and each one will produce ^green;Genes^reset;.

So you've built a ^orange;Sprouting Table^reset;? Why are you looking so clueless? It's simple: Toss in a ^orange;Potato Seed^reset; and wait about 60 seconds. You'll get a useful ^green;Gene^reset; for your botany research, or other goods
